issues.description: The Farm class’s `animals` attribute is declared public in the solution, but the UML diagram in the problem statement specifies it as a private field (indicated by the “–” visibility marker). This visibility mismatch breaks encapsulation and may confuse students about the intended access level.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of the `animals` field in `Farm.java` from public to private (i.e., `private List<Animal> animals;`).
